-1: click to select the instruction to execute
0: comment: text to explain the lines of code
108: line (position x1, position y1, position x2, position y2)
51: triangle (position x1, position y1, position x2, position y2, position x3, position y3)
97: random (variable, maximum random value to generate)
99: Code: It serves to show or hide lines with a particular function
109: image (image name, x position, y position, width, height)
116: text (text to display or variable, x position, y position)
114: rectangle (x position, y position, width, height)
101: ellipse (x position, y position, width, height)
105: if (value1 operator value2) The operator can be: >, ==, <, >=, <=, !=
118: video (video name, x position, y position, width, height)
111: for (from value; to condition; increment value)
